Metadata.Title: CVE-2023-44487 affecting package moby-buildx for versions less than 0.7.1-14
Metadata.Description: CVE-2023-44487 affecting package moby-buildx for versions less than 0.7.1-14. A patched version of the package is available.

Criterion.Comment: Package moby-buildx is earlier than 0.7.1-14, affected by CVE-2023-44487
